name: King's Kitchen
address: 92 E Broadway, New York, NY 10002, USA

menu.name: Roast Duck over Rice
menu.description: Tender Cantonese-style roast duck served over steamed white rice.

menu.name: Soy Sauce Chicken
menu.description: Classic soy sauce marinated chicken, served with rice and vegetables.

menu.name: BBQ Pork (Char Siu) over Rice
menu.description: Sweet and savory Cantonese BBQ pork slices over steamed rice.

menu.name: Wonton Noodle Soup
menu.description: Shrimp and pork wontons in a light broth with egg noodles.

menu.name: Beef Brisket Noodle Soup
menu.description: Braised beef brisket served in a rich broth with noodles.

menu.name: Roast Pork Bun
menu.description: Steamed bun filled with sweet and savory BBQ pork.

menu.name: Steamed Shrimp Dumplings (Har Gow)
menu.description: Delicate dumplings filled with shrimp, served steamed.

menu.name: Egg Tart
menu.description: Flaky pastry shell filled with creamy egg custard.
